step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with fists closed and arms drawn in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
You opened your fingers and extended your arms. Try to focus on exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you extend.
This is the return phase. Ensure your fingers are open and arms are relaxed as you bring them back towards your chest, inhaling.
Good job returning to the starting position. Remember to close your fingers into fists and tighten your muscles while inhaling.
You opened your fingers and extended your arms. Focus on exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you extend.
Great start to your second repetition! Keep those fists closed and arms drawn in, remembering to inhale and tighten.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles during this outward movement.
Good job returning to the starting position. Ensure your fingers are open and arms are relaxed as you bring them back, inhaling.
You've returned to the starting position. Remember to close your fists and tighten your muscles while inhaling for the next phase.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms, exhaling and relaxing. This completes the set.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to focus on closing your fists and inhaling while drawing arms in, then opening fingers and exhaling as you extend them. Keep up the good work!
